== Introduction ==
I have been using Ubuntu for a while and is time to get back to the comunity a little of my humble contribution. This page will discuss the steps that I go through in order to become an MOTU and is inspired by the friends <nowiki>[[protonchris-MOTU|Protonchris's MOTU page]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[EfrainValles-MOTUJourney|Efrain's MOTU page]]</nowiki>.

== Small Notes ==
 1.lintian wanted `-$(MAKE) distclean` in the hello rules file to be changed to `[ ! -f Makefile ] || $(MAKE) distclean`
 2.Hello 2.2 is now available in the gutsy repository.  So download <nowiki>[[http://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/hello/hello-2.2.tar.gz|Hello 2.2]]</nowiki> instead.
 3.There are some hard bugs to kill like the ones about /var/run/firebird/2.0 file missing in firebird2.0 hardy/gutsy package
